rules_text:
Bleed {1}{B}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its bleed cost if an opponent has lost life this turn.)[/i]
At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, draw two cards, then discard a card at random.
notes:
filter!assault 

fluffy: -has (Aid from the Cowl, Charging Cinderhorn)
